isis.stitle: TSI 95-12-04 - Service Procedure Changes For Model GT 40 Turbochargers Used On All DT 408/466 and the International® 530 Engines

subjectgroup.subject: Service Procedure Changes For Model GT 40 Turbochargers Used On All DT 408/466 and the International® 530 Engines

svcproc.title: DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: The center housing and rotating assembly used on Model GT 40 turbochargers for all 408, 466 and The International® 530 engines is serviced as a complete assembly only. Component parts for the center housing/rotating assembly previously released for service will not be available except, the backplate o-ring.

The engine service manual (Form Nos. EGES-105 & 105-1) addresses servicing turbocharger center housing/rotating assembly components. This procedure should be disregarded until the service manual is revised to reflect that these parts should not be serviced individually.

Service parts for the turbocharger center housing/rotating assembly are listed in the following catalogs: Form Nos. PC-4000, PC-8000, MT-512A & 1 171 657 R2. These parts should not be ordered. The part numbers will be omitted in the next revision.

note.para: OTHER COMPONENT SERVICE PARTS THAT ARE NOT PART OF THE CENTER HOUSING/ROTATING ASSEMBLY FOR MODEL GT 40 TURBOCHARGERS AS SHOWN IN THE PARTS CATALOGS ARE AVAILABLE FOR SERVICE.
KEEP A COPY OF THIS SERVICE LETTER WITH THE SERVICE MANUAL AND CATALOG, AS A REMINDER, WHEN SERVICING THE TURBOCHARGER DO NOT DISASSEMBLE THE CENTER HOUSING AND ROTATING ASSEMBLY.
